I had an excellent experience at Kopi C! The coffee was rich and flavorful, just the way I like. A special shoutout to Jason for providing outstanding service. He was friendly, attentive, and made my visit even more enjoyable. Highly recommend this place for anyone who loves great coffee and great service!
Watery diluted teh. Staff has bad attitude and served the tea that has been sitting on the counter to us then threw out the remaining tea. Perfect waste of $2.60
The service was awesome from the team and supervisor were friendly and the drink very nice. Up to the standard as the drink never fails me. Will patron again in the future.
Taste really good and the staff really friendly! Beverage serving really fast! Every time pass by will buy one cup!
